Room Division Management

Building on the foundational "Rooms Division Operations" module, this advanced "Rooms Division Management" course delves deeper into the management aspects within 5-star hotel settings. Focusing on strategic, practical skills in managing front office, housekeeping, and maintenance, it emphasizes advanced applications of Property Management Systems (PMS), service recovery techniques, and handling complex guest relations scenarios. Students engage in sophisticated simulations, developing managerial skills crucial for overseeing operations in luxury hotels. The course integrates theoretical knowledge with hands-on activities, preparing students for high-level roles in 5-star hotel rooms division management.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Understand advanced concepts and managerial responsibilities in rooms division management, extending beyond basic operations

+  Develop strategic skills in managing advanced reservations, check-in processes, and service recovery methods to enhance guest experiences.

+  Analyze and implement global trends and cultural diversity in rooms division management, catering to the expectations of a 5-star clientele.

+  Integrate practical knowledge in crisis management, problem-solving, and innovative practices within the realm of rooms division
